snippet: Narendra Modi, the front-runner for prime minister, has a reputation in the state of Gujarat for brushing aside political and regulatory obstacles that stall construction in other parts of India.
abstract: Narendra Modi, front-runner in India's race for prime minister, has a reputation in the state of Gujarat for brushing aside political and regulatory obstacles that stall construction in other parts of India; because of Modi's efforts, Gujarat's economy has grown 10 percent a year, higher than the Indian average, for much of the last decade; some question whether his penchant for grand, earth-moving building projects makes sense when the state is still struggling with social problems like mortality and malnutrition.
lead_paragraph: Narendra Modi, the front-runner for prime minister, has a reputation in the state of Gujarat for brushing aside political and regulatory obstacles that stall construction in other parts of India.

headline.main: Local Policies Help an Indian Candidate Trying to Go National
headline.print_headline: Local Policies Help an Indian Candidate Trying to Go National
